title: Lecture 2
contents:
Kalleberg, A. L. (2000). Nonstandard employment relations: Part-time, temporary and contract work. Annual review of sociology, 26(1), 341-365.

Background
1970sâ€™ oil crises  sluggish economic growth  high unemployment in the West  inability to generate full employment for everyone (Emmenegger, 2009).
Nonstandard employment relations are not new. In fact, internal labor markets in the post-World War II period were more of an exception than a regularity.
